css:
<style>
    .print-format table, .print-format tr, 
    .print-format td, .print-format th,  .print-format div, .print-format p {
        font-family: Monospace;
	line-height: 100%;
        vertical-align: middle;
    }
   .print-format td, .print-format th {
       padding: 0.5px !important;
    }
   .print-format hr{
	margin-top: 2px;
	margin-bottom: 4px;
	border-top: 1px solid #2d3135;
    }	
    @media screen {
        .print-format {
            width: 33.1in;
            padding: 0.25in;
            min-height: 46.8<style>
    .print-format table, .print-format tr, 
    .print-format td, .print-format div, .print-format p {
        font-family: Monospace;
        line-height: 200%;
        vertical-align: middle;
    }
    @media screen {
        .print-format {
            width: 33.8in;
            padding: 0.25in;
            min-height: 46.8in;
        }
    }
</style>
format_data:
[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "

{{doc.company}}

COST SHEET

"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldname": "_custom_html", "options": "
{% set kk=doc.fn_calculate_cost() %}

Rule Code : {{doc.rule_code}}    Name : {{doc.rule_name}}    Rate : {{frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.rate, precision = 2, currency= "INR")}}( {{doc.rate_per}} )

Revision : {{doc.revision_number}}   Duty Hrs : {{doc.wage_hours}}   Contract Hrs : {{doc.contract_hours}}    No.Duty : {{doc.number_of_duties}}   Rate Included Relieving Charges : {{frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.WAGERATE, precision = 2, currency= "INR")}}

Work Type : {{doc.work_type_name}}    Customer : {{doc.party_name}}     Site : {{doc.site_name}}     From : {{doc.from_date}} To {{doc.to_date}}

DescriptionBenifitsOthersCostCost %Rate %

EARNEDBASIC

EARNED DA

 {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.EARNEDBASIC, precision = 2, currency= "INR") }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(0.00, precision = 2, currency= "INR") }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.EARNEDBASIC, precision = 2, currency= "INR") }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(((doc.EARNEDBASIC / doc.TOTALCOSTTOCOMPANY) * 100), precision = 2, currency= "INR") }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(((doc.EARNEDBASIC / doc.WAGERATE) * 100), precision = 2, currency= "INR") }}
{{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.EARNEDDA, precision = 2, currency= "INR") }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(0.00, precision = 2, currency= "INR") }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.EARNEDDA, precision = 2, currency= "INR") }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(((doc.EARNEDDA / doc.TOTALCOSTTOCOMPANY) * 100), precision = 2, currency= "INR") }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(((doc.EARNEDDA / doc.WAGERATE) * 100), precision = 2, currency= "INR") }}

BASIC TOTAL

{{ frappe.utils.fmt_money((doc.EARNEDBASIC + doc.EARNEDDA), precision = 2, currency= "INR") }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money((doc.EARNEDBASIC + doc.EARNEDDA), precision = 2, currency= "INR") }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money((((doc.EARNEDBASIC + doc.EARNEDDA) / doc.TOTALCOSTTOCOMPANY) * 100), precision = 2, currency= "INR") }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money((((doc.EARNEDBASIC + doc.EARNEDDA) / doc.WAGERATE) * 100) , precision = 2, currency= "INR") }}

EARNED HRA

EARNED CONVEYANCE ALLOWANCE

EARNED EDUCATIONAL ALLOWANCE

EARNED SPECIAL ALLOWANCE

EARNED WASHING ALLOWANCE

EARNED PERFORMANCE ALLOWANCE

EARNED MONTHLY BONUS

REIMBURSE AMOUNT

NH AMOUNT

{{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.TOTALALLOWANCES, precision = 2, currency= "INR") }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.TOTALALLOWANCES, precision = 2, currency= "INR") }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(((doc.TOTALALLOWANCES / doc.TOTALCOSTTOCOMPANY) * 100), precision = 2, currency= "INR") }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(((doc.TOTALALLOWANCES / doc.WAGERATE) * 100) , precision = 2, currency= "INR") }}
